original: 東漢官員，任越騎校尉、偏將軍。與董承、吳碩受漢獻帝的衣帶詔，密謀除去曹操。但風聲走漏，被曹操察覺，因而被殺。
text: An official of the Eastern Han Dynasty, served as a captain and general general of Yue. He and Dong Cheng and Wu Shuo were conspired to remove Cao Cao under the edict of Emperor Xian of the Han Dynasty. However, the wind leaked and Cao Cao noticed and was killed.
